scripts.deploy: cd dehive-messaging && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ dehive-messaging
scripts.deploy:studio: cd dehive-messaging && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ dehive-messaging
scripts.create-local: cd dehive-messaging && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ dehive-messaging
scripts.deploy-local: cd dehive-messaging && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dehive-messaging
